attr.title: Super Dungeon Muncher
attr.desc: Super Dungeon Muncher combines puzzles and rogue-like action with a unique twist. The Muncher chases you in real time as you progress through the world. Act fast and think quick or the Muncher will get you.
attr.desc_md: **Super Dungeon Muncher** combines the thrill of **puzzle-solving** with the intense challenge of **rogue-like action**â€”all with a unique twist. As you journey through the world, the relentless *Muncher** will chase you in real time. Every second counts: **act fast** and **think quickly**, or risk being caught by the **Muncher**.
attr.inst: Download the game and extract it. Put the data.win from the extracted folder into your ports/superdungeonmuncher folder.
